results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) is the total number of parts of denomination k used in all n-part feasible partitions described in A254296.
comment: Sum of row n equals n*A254430(n).
link: Md. Towhidul Islam, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..364

Md Towhidul Islam & Md Shahidul Islam, Number of Partitions of an n-kilogram Stone into Minimum Number of Weights to Weigh All Integral Weights from 1 to n kg(s) on a Two-pan Balance, arXiv:1502.07730 [math.CO], 2015.
